title: When you want to hate on someone because they are playing an easy champ
body:
But they're so nice and you can't pull yourself to do it
https://shelbynewallis.files.wordpress.com/2014/09/um.gif

replies.body: {{champion:92}} The one time the player is actually nice

<3~

I'm so nice I send people Joker Laughs :D

https://youtu.be/wcinzmfZeCc

thats Nice right =3
You're that person that plays Riven. I hope you get reported

{{champion:86}} "Very close, you could have gotten me!"

(internal struggle)

It always seems like the good players are the ones that like to bitch and have awful attitudes. 

it's really confusing when you get those players that make mistakes but they're so damn nice about it. Like, no way can I be mad at you.
{{champion:45}} "Know that if the tables were turned, I would show you no mercy!"
